summary: Vincent is about to become a father. At a meeting with childhood friends he announces the name for his future son. The scandalous name ignites a discussion which surfaces unpleasant matters from the past of the group.
cast: Patrick Bruel|Valérie Benguigui|Charles Berling|Guillaume de Tonquédec|Judith El Zein|Françoise Fabian|Yaniss Lespert|Miren Pradier|Alexis Leprisé|Juliette Levant|Bernard Murat|Benoît Pilot|Fanny Thiennot
keywords: huis clos|france|reference to adolphe by benjamin constant|moroccan cuisine|dinner party
director: Directors: Alexandre de La Patellière, Matthieu Delaporte
title: El nombre
